post:
Hi. We have recently received funding from private investors and we are going to give away some VPS in DigitalOcean style.
We are going to have 100 big E3 SSD RAID 10 servers for the start and we are going to offer 2 GB KVM plans free forever.

Here are the full specifications:

<br>RAM: 2 GB
<br>Disk: 50 GB
<br>Bandwidth: 2 TB
<br>Support: 24/7
<br>Management: Full
<br>Free forever
